short_summary: This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture
description: The procurement of furniture for the fisheries and oceans department, including office furniture, to be delivered and installed at Mont-Joli, Quebec.
full_summary:
###### [Title]
**Product Category 6: Support Space – Collaborative Furniture**
=========================================================

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-----------------------------------------

### Tender Announcement

The Government of Canada, represented by Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites bidders to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition and installation of office furniture for its facilities in Mont-Joli, Quebec.

### Summary of Requirements

This RFP covers a requirement for:

* Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture
* Purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to meet the needs of Fisheries and Oceans Canada

The desired delivery date is March 1, 2023.

### Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Solicitation Method

The bid solicitation is open to:

* General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders)
* Suppliers who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders, provided they qualify for a SA and follow the qualification process

### Contact Information

Please contact Marius Lacasse, Procurement Officer, at Fisheries and Oceans Canada for further information:

* Email: [Marius.Lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Marius.Lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Phone: [Insert phone number]
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6

### Documents

The solicitation documents, including the RFP and annexes, are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).

### Closing Date

The closing date for this RFP is November 21, 2022, at 13:00 Eastern Standard Time. Late bids will not be accepted.
